definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I also think it makes Aunts "Associate Research Assistants ".
sentences.chinese: 偶想，小姨子也因此成了“研究员助理”。

sentences.english: The attrition have last year he transferred to the charge of the general affairs sister-in-law?
sentences.chinese: 这次减员有没有他去年调来的那个管总务的小姨子？

sentences.english: How do you think of the men's "sister-in-law complex"?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待男人的“小姨子情结”？

sentences.english: My brother got pickled at his sister-in-law's wedding.
sentences.chinese: 我哥在他小姨子的婚礼上喝多了。
